sentence.Network_en: The ship would lie there mirrored in a perfectly unmoving glossy sea.
sentence.Network_cn: 船会停靠在那里，映衬在一片波澜不兴的湛蓝海水之中。

sentence.Network_en: He stood, unmoving, in the shadows.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一动不动地站在阴暗处。

sentence.Network_en: You cannot hear me. I am static and unmoving.
sentence.Network_cn: 你听不到我的声音, 因为我是静止的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(U2) ... unmoved 无动于衷的 unmoving 不感动人的 unmuffle 消音物.
社会工作专业英语词汇(U) ... unmovedness 不动心 unmoving 不动的 unmusical 对音乐不感兴趣的.
something mysterious is formed , born in the silent void . waiting alone and unmoving , it is at once still and yet in constant motion .寂静的虚空里诞生了一种神秘的东西，它独自守候着，毫无动静，它立刻静止了。

list.abs: at others I would find him on the campstool , sitting in his gray sleeping suit and with his cropped dark hair like a patient , unmoved convict .不然我便见他坐在折凳上，穿着灰色的睡衣，一头黑发剪得短短的，活象一个耐性挺好、毫不动情的囚犯。

" Watch what ? " says my 14-year-old daughter unmoved on the couch in her basketball sweats , Wednesday's junior varsity practice complete , nothing more to learn tonight .“看什么？”我14岁的女儿问。她坐在沙发上，穿著打篮球时穿的运动衣一动不动。今晚她刚刚结束了训练，没什么作业要做了。
He remained unmoved even when she began to cry ., 甚至当她开始哭泣时 , 他还是无动于衷.
A stubborn , unmovable person ., 顽固的 , 不可动摇的人.

auth_sentence.content: The bump n' grind seems mechanical and oddly unmoving.
auth_sentence.res_content: The bump n' grind seems mechanical and oddly unmoving.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The bump n' grind seems mechanical and oddly unmoving.

auth_sentence.content: Two lives preserved in amber, unmoving.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Two lives preserved in amber, unmoving.

auth_sentence.content: That God is eternal, unborn, unmoving and yet has an effect on the world just by being.
auth_sentence.res_content: That God is eternal, unborn, unmoving and yet has an effect on the world just by being.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That God is eternal, unborn, unmoving and yet has an effect on the world just by being.
